info.title: IPH API
info.description: The IPH API services the International Performance Hub that is a comprehensive platform for public users to access and engage on global performance indicators.

get.summary: List of key pillars and top five KPIs
get.description: Return key pillars and the top five KPIs for each pillar that includes their latest value, last measured year, global ranking and change in rank from previous measurement

200.description: return key pillars and top five KPIs for each pillar

isClassic.description: indicates if the classic view data is available

isSdg.description: indicates if the SDG view data is available

classic.description: collection of all elements (key pillars and top KPIs) in the classic view

pillarId.description: unique identification number of the pillar

pillarIconSM.description: the icon associated with the pillar - small sized in base64 format

sdg.description: collection of all elements (key pillars and top KPIs) in the SDG view

pillarId.description: unique identification number of the pillar

pillarIconSM.description: the icon associated with the pillar - small sized in base64 format

get.summary: List of all classic view pillars
get.description: Return all the pillars, the total number of pillars, and KPIs under the classic view

200.description: return list of pillars and summary information of each pillar under classic view

numOfPillars.description: the total number of pillars in the classic view

numOfIndicators.description: the total number of indicators in the classic view

pillars.description: array of pillars under the classic view

id.description: unique identification number of the pillar

iconLG.description: the icon associated with the pillar - large sized in base64 format

totalIndicators.description: total number of indicators under the pillar

get.description: Return all the pillars, the total number of pillars, and KPIs under the SDG view

200.description: return list of pillars and summary information of each pillar under SDG view

numOfPillars.description: the total number of pillars in the SDG view

numOfIndicators.description: the total number of indicators in the SDG view

pillars.description: array of pillars under the SDG view

id.description: unique indentification number of the pillar

iconLG.description: the icon associated with the pillar - large sized in base64 format

totalIndicators.description: total number of indicators under the pillar

get.summary: List of indicators for a specific pillar under the classic view
get.description: Return list of all indicators and summary of key indicators (top five) for a specific pillar under the classic view

parameters.name: pillar-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification code of the pillar under the classic view

200.description: return list of all indicators and summary of key indicators (top five) for a specific pillar under the classic view

pillarId.description: unique identification number of the pillar

pillarIconLG.description: the icon associated with the pillar - large sized in base64 format

indicators.description: an array of indicators under the pillar

id.description: unqiue identification number of the indicator

get.summary: List of indicators for a specific pillar under the SDG view
get.description: Return list of all indicators and summary of key indicators (top five) for a specific pillar under the SDG view

parameters.name: pillar-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification code of the pillar under the SDG view

200.description: return list of all indicators and summary of key indicators (top five) for a specific pillar under the SDG view

pillarId.description: unique identification number of the pillar

pillarIconLG.description: the icon associated with the pillar - large sized in base64 format

indicators.description: an array of indicators under the pillar

id.description: the identification number of the indicator

get.description: Return the KPI detailed information including country-wise measurement values for comparative analysis under the classic view

parameters.name: pillar-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification code of the pillar under the classic view

parameters.name: indicator-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification code of the indicator under the pillar for classic view

200.description: return the KPI detailed information including country-wise measurement values for comparative analysis under the classic view

hasSubIndicators.description: indicates if the indicator has any sub-indicators

indicatorKSAValue.description: the latest value of the indicator for Saudi Arabia

indicatorUnit.description: the unit of measurement for the indicator

indicatorMeasurementYear.description: the year when the latest value of the indicator was captured - format YYYY

indicatorPolarity.description: the indicator polarity indicates its preferred direction - a "positive" polarity indicates higher values are preferable and a "negative" polarity indicates lower values are preferable

indicatorSourceName.description: the source name from which the indicator values are retrieved from

indicatorSourceLink.description: the URL link of source from which the indicator values are retrieved from

topCountry.description: the name of the country that secured the highest rank for this indicator

countries.description: the indicator measurements for all the countries and their trend values across the years

rank.description: the global rank of the country

outOfRank.description: the maximum range on which the indicator global rank is assigned

value.description: the value of the indicator for the country

rankChange.description: the change in rank of the country compared to the previous value

trend.description: the historical details of the measured indicator across the years

value.description: the value of the indicator for the specific year

year.description: the year when the value was recorded for the indicator

countryGroup.description: an array which reflects the group(s) the country belongs to - world; g20;gcc;

example.indicatorDescription: حرية الصحافة هي الإمكانية الفعلية للصحفيين لاختيار وإنتاج ونشر المعلومات التي تصب في المصلحة العامة، بشكل مستقل عن التدخل السياسي والاقتصادي والقانوني والاجتماعي، ودون أي تهديدات ضد سلامتهم الجسدية والعقلية

get.summary: Detailed KPI information for indicators under the SDG view
get.description: Return the KPI detailed information including country-wise measurement values for comparative analysis under the SDG view

parameters.name: pillar-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification code of the pillar under the SDG view

parameters.name: indicator-id
parameters.description: the unqiue identification code of the indicator under the pillar for SDG view

200.description: return the KPI detailed information including country-wise measurement values for comparative analysis under the SDG view

hasSubIndicators.description: indicates if the indicator has any sub-indicators

indicatorKSAValue.description: the latest value of the indicator for Saudi Arabia

indicatorUnit.description: the unit of measurement for the indicator

indicatorMeasurementYear.description: the year when the latest value of the indicator was captured - format YYYY

indicatorPolarity.description: the indicator polarity indicates its preferred direction - a "positive" polarity indicates higher values are preferable and a "negative" polarity indicates lower values are preferable

indicatorSourceName.description: the source name from which the indicator values are retrieved from

indicatorSourceLink.description: the URL link of source from which the indicator values are retrieved from

topCountry.description: the name of the country that secured the highest rank for this indicator

countries.description: the indicator measurements for all the countries and their trend values across the years

rank.description: the global rank of the country

outOfRank.description: the maximum range on which the indicator global rank is assigned

value.description: the value of the indicator for the country

rankChange.description: the change in rank of the country compared to the previous value

trend.description: the historical details of the measured indicator across the years

value.description: the value of the indicator for the specific year

year.description: the year when the value was recorded for the indicator

countryGroup.description: an array which reflects the group(s) the country belongs to - world; g20;gcc;

example.indicatorDescription: حرية الصحافة هي الإمكانية الفعلية للصحفيين لاختيار وإنتاج ونشر المعلومات التي تصب في المصلحة العامة، بشكل مستقل عن التدخل السياسي والاقتصادي والقانوني والاجتماعي، ودون أي تهديدات ضد سلامتهم الجسدية والعقلية

kpis.description: collection of indicators/sub-indicators and associated details

id.description: unique identification number of the KPI

value.description: the latest value of the KPI

unit.description: the unit of measurement for the KPI

year.description: the year when the latest value of the KPI was captured - format YYYY

rank.description: the global rank of the KPI

outOf.description: the maximum range on which the KPI global rank is assigned

change.description: the percentage change in the rank from the previous measurement of the KPI - positive or negative value

scale.description: the scale on which the KPI value is captured

polarity.description: the KPI polarity indicates its preferred direction - a "positive" polarity indicates higher values are preferable and a "negative" polarity indicates lower values are preferable

trend.description: array of the last five measured values in ascending order (latest value last)
